subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: While their passion is not the same as it is for basketball, Kentucky football fans have shown up and supported the team through the coaching changes, N.C.A.A. scandals and lopsided defeats.
snippet: While their passion is not the same as it is for basketball, Kentucky football fans have shown up and supported the team through the coaching changes, N.C.A.A. scandals and lopsided defeats.
